CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Automatically swing the camera back and forth
CONTROLS.NAME: auto_camera

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Remove depth of field for fully focused scene
CONTROLS.NAME: focused

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Control where the camera is pointed
CONTROLS.NAME: cam_look

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Field of View of the perspective of the camera
CONTROLS.NAME: FOV

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Quick 'zoom in' field of view hit
CONTROLS.NAME: FOV_bump

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Add flashes scanning along X-axis in scene
CONTROLS.NAME: scan_x

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Add flashes scanning along Z-axis in scene
CONTROLS.NAME: scan_z

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Adjust the size of the pixels that form the walls
CONTROLS.NAME: pixelation

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Whether media that paints the pixel walls is scrolling or not
CONTROLS.NAME: media_scrolling

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Adds flashes to the media on the walls
CONTROLS.NAME: auto_flasher

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Remove side walls for a flat plane above and below
CONTROLS.NAME: flat_space

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Rotate the planes around the camera
CONTROLS.NAME: rotate_planes

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Make the wall pixels circles instead of squares
CONTROLS.NAME: small_circles

DESCRIPTION: A multipass reflective box tunnel with some random reflective ray scattering thrown in. Basically, it's just a remake of W23's "Path Racer" and NuSan's "Corridor Travel" examples.
TITLE: Traced Tunnel_dup
